name: @gerrproger/not-jquery
author: Gerrproger
description: A set of libraries for convenient browser extensions development

scripts.build: rimraf dist && esbuild --platform=browser --target=es6,ie10 --minify --outdir=dist --out-extension:.js=.min.js src/not-jquery.js src/not-browser.js src/not-jquery-noajax.js
